name: sondersendung-4
text:
HEADER
Podcast: Sondersendung Episode: 6
Starttime: Mo Dec 30 2013 15:30:00 GMT+0100 (CET)
relativeTimestamps: no
Endtime: Mo Dec 30 2013 15:30:00 GMT+0100 (CET)
Podcaster: Ralf Stockmann (@rstockm), Tim Pritlove (@timpritlove), Claudia Krell (@wortkomplex)
Guests: Benjamin, Eric <http://ericteubert.de/>
Shownoter: mrmoe <https://alpha.app.net/moe>, @vale <https://alpha.app.net/vale>, @Quimoniz <https://alpha.app.net/Quimoniz>, Simon Waldherr <http://simon.waldherr.eu/>, @evita <http://twitter.com/evitabley>, @BigMcIntosh91, @Dr4k3 <https://twitter.com/dr4k3_le>
Chat: <http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=sondersendung>
Stream: <http://streams.xenim.de/sendezentrum.mp3>
Webseite: <http://die-sondersendung.de/live-beschallung>
Episodepage: <http://die-sondersendung.de/XXXXXX>
Episodetitle: 30C3 - Tag 4
/HEADER
